name: Under the rails
description:
/!\ This version of the game is unfinished, check the devlog ! /!\

Pitch

The player is plunged into the middle of the French industrial revolution when he has to repair his train which has been attacked by creatures that have appeared along with the ambient pollution of the cities due to massive production. The damage is extensive and repairs may take some time. But don't give up now.

A game made with GameMaker Studio 2 and Illustrator.

Controls

RightDLeftAJumpWDownSShootMouse left button
